name: Chess Factorio
description:
You're working in a chess factory. Your mission is to wipe out any chess pieces stay on the board or the machine will crash. You can wipe out chess pieces with the same color by lining 5 of them up in horizontal, vertical or diagonal direction. Some chess piece have DIFFERENT MOVES based on their types. Keep the machine working as long as possible.


HOW TO PLAY

- Press a piece to select, press again to move that piece. If there is no path, the piece won't move.
- Use mouse and drag to move the camera around
- Line the chess pieces with the same color up to 5 or more in vertical, horizontal or diagonal direction to wipe them out

MOVES
- The queen can move in any direction
- The horse can move anywhere
- The castle can only move in horizontal and vertical directions
- The bishop can only move in diagonal directions
